headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Reminds Shareholders with Losses on their Investment in Hasbro, Inc. of Class Action Lawsuit and Upcoming Deadlines - HAS
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Hasbro, Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

headline: Hasbro: I Think There Is Untapped Potential With Yields Approaching 5%
summary: Hasbro's shares have dropped over 20%, pushing the dividend yield to nearly 5%, and making shares trade under 15 times 2024 expected earnings. Read more here.
